@slightlylate @shortdiv The Redirects API is deliberately quite simple and just lets you key off of route, language, country, and role (for JWT-based auth) However... Edge Handlers will let you key off of any header you like and some built-in goodies besides. Very powerful. https://t.co/dNm0pXkJZj
